title: PulseCheck
description: A health monitoring device paired with an app to track vital signs and wellness trends.
introduction: PulseCheck is an innovative health monitoring system designed to make tracking vital signs and wellness trends easy and accessible. This project aims to empower individuals to take control of their health through real-time data and personalized insights.

sections.title: Motivation
sections.body: The motivation behind PulseCheck stemmed from the need for a user-friendly and accessible health monitoring solution. Traditional methods often require frequent visits to healthcare providers, which can be inconvenient and time-consuming. By creating a wearable device paired with a mobile app, we aimed to provide individuals with a seamless way to track their health metrics daily.

sections.title: Prototype Development
sections.body: The initial prototype of PulseCheck involved developing a wearable device using Arduino for data collection and a mobile app built with React Native. Challenges included ensuring accurate data transmission between the device and the app, as well as optimizing battery life. We overcame these by implementing low-energy Bluetooth communication and efficient power management algorithms.

sections.title: App Refinement
sections.body: User testing revealed the need for a more intuitive user interface. We refined the app to include features like customizable dashboards, trend analysis, and push notifications for abnormal readings. Integrating machine learning algorithms allowed for personalized insights, enhancing the overall user experience.

sections.title: Final Product
sections.body: The final version of PulseCheck includes a sleek, lightweight wearable device that tracks heart rate, blood pressure, and oxygen levels. The app provides real-time data visualization, historical trends, and alerts for unusual readings. We used hypoallergenic materials for the wristband to ensure comfort for all-day wear.

sections.title: Future Plans
sections.body: Looking ahead, we plan to integrate AI-driven predictive analytics to offer users proactive health recommendations. Additionally, we aim to expand the device's capabilities to monitor more health metrics and enhance compatibility with other smart devices. Exploring partnerships with healthcare providers will further enhance the system's utility in clinical settings.
